content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction with numerator 5, and denominator, open parenthesis, 2 x plus 1, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, x minus 2, close parenthesis, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 2 times the natural log of, the absolute value of 2 x plus 1, end absolute value, plus the natural log of, the absolute value of x minus 2, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="4.0ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mrow></math>

<math alttext="one half times the natural log of, the absolute value of 2 x plus 1, end absolute value, minus 2 times the natural log of, the absolute value of x minus 2, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>
